title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Solana (SOL) Drops 5.6%, Leading Index Lower
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Uniswap (UNI) was also among the underperformers, falling 4.3% from Tuesday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2814.47, down 1.6% (-46.85) since 4 p.m. ET on Tuesday.

Ten of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: LTC (+7.9%) and ICP (+2.2%).

Laggards: SOL (-5.6%) and UNI (-4.3%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 index dropped 1.6% with major cryptocurrencies like SOL and UNI declining significantly, indicating overall market weakness.
